news.title: South Western becomes first rail company renationalised by Labour
news.summary: The first service under new public ownership will be partially operated by a rail replacement bus.

news.title: Farage commits to reinstating winter fuel payment
news.summary: Reform UK also plans to scrap the two-child benefit policy, as part of plans to outflank the government.

news.title: Russian strikes kill eight across Ukraine, officials say
news.summary: Deaths were reported in Ukraine's west, south and the capital Kyiv region, while Russia says it destroyed 95 Ukrainian drones.

news.title: Murder arrest as mum and three children die in fire
news.summary: A 41-year-old man was arrested at the scene on suspicion of murder and remains in custody.

news.title: The Papers:  Child benefit cap 'to be lifted' and fires 'twist'
news.summary: Plans to lift limits on child benefit payments and calls to restore the winter fuel allowance lead the papers.

news.title: France impounds UK vessel accused of illegal fishing
news.summary: The British ship is diverted to the port of Boulogne after being stopped by a French patrol boat.

news.title: How one woman's racist tweet sparked a free speech row
news.summary: Lucy Connolly lost her appeal against her race-hate jail sentence, but is free speech under threat?
